title: Who's The Hero lyrics  Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Andrea Jeremiah
Song : Who's The Hero
Lyrics : Kamal Haasan


[Who's The Hero, Who's The Hero
Kaaka vandha vathiyaaro
Thaaka vandha partygalai
Naaru Naarai kilikum zaaro] (2)


Hmmm saahasathin marupero
Seerivandha vegamaana arrow
Paayumpodhe andha lavagathai paren


[Who's The Hero, Who's The Hero
Kaaka vandha vathiyaaro
Thaaka vandha partygalai
Naaru Naarai kilikum zaaro] (2)


Ma-yam mandhiram
Kan-kattum vithaigal
Idhu edhum indriye
Man madhan ambu paayume


Kayam enbadhu
Poi endru sonnadhu
Thappaaga thondrudhe
Nam hero-vai paarthadhum


Nentru indrum vellum aalu nam aalu
Naalai kooda nama aal thaan
Nalladhuku saavi poduvaan


[Who's The Hero, Who's The Hero
Kaaka vandha vathiyaaro
Thaaka vandha partygalai
Naaru Naarai kilikum zaaro] (2)


1 2 3 and 4
baby shut yourself and lock the door
ak dho theen ya char
you will get what ever you are


go go go baby go
go as far as can go
nowhere is too far man
you'll drag you out of any jam


Veli thaandum aadum yar-ambu yaaro
Wave-vu paarkum indha aal yar yar yar


[Who's The Hero, Who's The Hero
Kaaka vandha vathiyaaro
Thaaka vandha partygalai
Naaru Naarai kilikum zaaro] (2)

seo.title: Who's The Hero lyrics  Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Who's The Hero lyrics  Manmadhan Ambu songs lyrics from Manmadhan Ambu. Read the lyrics penned by Kamal Haasan and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Andrea Jeremiah. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kamal Haasan, Manmadhan Ambu, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Andrea Jeremiah, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
